name: Arborescence
description:
Hello, my name is Quell.

I am the guardian spirit of my forest. Some of these trees aren't ready for the upcoming season yet; let's see if we can fix that in this foliage-changing puzzle game! Strategically use keys to open matching locks on all the trees to change their colours for the season. How many seasons can we go for?

Each tree in my forest is unique; no two are alike. Each grove of trees is also grown in such a way so that they all have at least one guaranteed way to change them all.

Credits
